text: Frederick Davies (22 August 1939 – 2 September 2020) was an English footballer. He was born in Liverpool. He made nearly 400 appearances in the Football League playing as a goalkeeper for Wolverhampton Wanderers, Cardiff City and AFC Bournemouth. He later became a manager, taking charge of Shrewsbury Town and Weymouth. Davies died on 2 September 2020 from idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, aged 81. ==Honours== ===Player=== Cardiff City *Welsh Cup winner: 1968, 1969, 1970 ===Manager=== Shrewsbury Town *Football League Third Division winner: 1993–94 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis Category:English footballers Category:English football managers Category:Sportspeople from Liverpool Category:AFC Bournemouth players Category:Cardiff City F.C. players Category:Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C. players
title: Fred Davies
